Xiao-Ming Wu (伍晓鸣)

M.S. Student, ISEE laboratory

Computer Science, School of Computer Science and Engineering

Sun Yat-Sen University


Email: wuxm65@mail2.sysu.edu.cn

Biography

I am currently a master student at Sun Yat-Sen University. As a graduate student, I follow Professor Wei-Shi Zheng and mainly work on computer vision and machine learning.

During my undergraduate study in Shandong University, I worked with Assistant Professor Xin Luo and Professor Xin-Shun Xu, mainly worked on hashing retrieval.

Education

  • Master in Computer Science
    2022-now
    Sun Yat-Sen University
  • Bachelor in Software Engineering (ranking 1/354)
    2018-2022
    Shandong University

Research Interest

  • Machine Learning
  • Computer Vision
  • Model Compression
